inkball

类 Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    The Level class represents a game level in the Inkball game. It manages the layout, score, time, balls, lines, and interactions within the level.

    • 字段概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Level

        public Level(int level,
             GameConfig configObject)
        Constructs a Level instance with the specified level index and configuration.
        参数:
        level - The index of the level.
        configObject - The GameConfig object containing configuration data.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setupLevel

        public void setupLevel(App app)
        Initializes the level by loading its display and setting up game elements.
        参数:
        app - The main application instance.

      • drawLines

        protected void drawLines(App app)
        Draws the lines on the level.
        参数:
        app - App to draw to.

      • drawBalls

        public void drawBalls(App app)
        Draws the balls on the level and updates their positions.
        参数:
        app - App to draw to.

      • updateTimeAndSpawn

        public void updateTimeAndSpawn()
        Updates the time and spawns new balls as needed.

      • draw

        public void draw(App app)
        Main draw method for the level. This method sets the background and calls the methods to draw tiles, balls, remaining balls, lines, updates time and spawns new balls, and draws the score and time.
        参数:
        app - App to draw to..

      • getCurrentScore

        public int getCurrentScore()
        Gets the current score of the level.
        返回:
        The current score.

      • startNewLine

        public void startNewLine(int x,
                         int y)
        Starts a new line at the specified coordinates.
        参数:
        x - The x-coordinate for the starting point of the line.
        y - The y-coordinate for the starting point of the line.

      • deleteLine

        public void deleteLine(int x,
                       int y)
        Deletes the line that the player choose.
        参数:
        x - The x-coordinate of the point to check.
        y - The y-coordinate of the point to check.

      • addNewLinePoint

        public void addNewLinePoint(int x,
                            int y)
        Adds a new point to the current line if it exists.
        参数:
        x - The x-coordinate of the point to add.
        y - The y-coordinate of the point to add.

      • addNewLine

        public void addNewLine()
        Resets the current line to null, indicating that a new line can be started.

      • spawnNewBall

        public void spawnNewBall()
        Spawns a new ball if available in the BallManager. Selects a random spawn tile from valid options and adds the new ball to the game.

      • isCaptureSuccessful

        public boolean isCaptureSuccessful(java.lang.String holeColor,
                                   Ball ball)
        Checks if the capture of the ball was successful based on color matching.
        参数:
        holeColor - The color of the hole.
        ball - The ball to check.
        返回:
        True if the capture was successful, false otherwise.

      • calScoreChange

        public float calScoreChange(java.lang.String holeColor,
                            Ball ball)
        Calculates the score change based on the hole color and ball state.
        参数:
        holeColor - The color of the hole.
        ball - The ball being evaluated.
        返回:
        The score change resulting from this interaction.

      • addScoreToAPP

        public void addScoreToAPP(App app,
                          float scoreAdded)
        Adds the specified score to the application.
        参数:
        app - The main application instance.
        scoreAdded - The score to add.

      • pauseTheGame

        public void pauseTheGame()
        Toggles the pause state of the game.

      • isLevelEnded

        public boolean isLevelEnded()
        Checks if the level has ended due to no remaining balls.
        返回:
        True if the level has ended, false otherwise.

      • isLevelFinished

        public boolean isLevelFinished()
        Checks if the level is finished.
        返回:
        True if the level is finished, false otherwise.

      • moveYellowTiles

        public void moveYellowTiles(App app)
        Moves the yellow tiles based on their current positions.
        参数:
        app - The main application instance.

      • LevelFinishedAddScore

        public void LevelFinishedAddScore(App app)
        Adds score based on remaining time when the level is finished. It increments the score every two frames while the level is finished.
        参数:
        app - The main application instance.

      • isValidTime

        protected boolean isValidTime(int time)
        Check if the time is valid.
        参数:
        time - The time to validate.
        返回:
        True if the time is valid, false otherwise.
